title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\EmploymentRecord
name: EmploymentRecord
description:
Resource that represents an employment record of a candidate.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.start_date
params.description: Start date of the employment.

params.name: data.end_date
params.description: End date of the employment.

params.name: data.employer_name
params.description: The name of the employer company/organization. For example, "Google", "Alphabet", and so on. Number of characters allowed is 250.

params.name: data.division_name
params.description: The division name of the employment. For example, division, department, client, and so on. Number of characters allowed is 100.

params.name: data.address
params.description: The physical address of the employer.

params.name: data.job_title
params.description: The job title of the employment. For example, "Software Engineer", "Data Scientist", and so on. Number of characters allowed is 250.

params.name: data.job_description
params.description: The description of job content. Number of characters allowed is 100,000.

params.name: data.is_supervisor
params.description: If the jobs is a supervisor position.

params.name: data.is_self_employed
params.description: If this employment is self-employed.

params.name: data.is_current
params.description: If this employment is current.

params.name: data.job_title_snippet
params.description: Output only. The job title snippet shows how the [job_title][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord.job_title] is related to a search query. It's empty if the [job_title][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord.job_title] isn't related to the search query.

params.name: data.job_description_snippet
params.description: Output only. The job description snippet shows how the [job_description][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord.job_description] is related to a search query. It's empty if the [job_description][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord.job_description] isn't related to the search query.

params.name: data.employer_name_snippet
params.description: Output only. The employer name snippet shows how the [employer_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord.employer_name] is related to a search query. It's empty if the [employer_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord.employer_name] isn't related to the search query.
